# tickk - Free Voice Productivity App

> Voice-first productivity application for ADHD minds and busy professionals. Brain dump first, organize later.

## Overview

tickk is a revolutionary free voice-first productivity app that uses natural language processing to automatically categorize spoken input into tasks, notes, and reminders. No login required, works offline, maintains complete privacy.

## Key Features

- **Voice-First Input**: 99% accurate speech recognition using Web Speech API
- **Auto-Categorization**: NLP-powered classification (tasks vs notes) using compromise.js
- **Complete Privacy**: Zero data collection, all processing happens locally in browser
- **Works Offline**: Progressive Web App with IndexedDB storage
- **Free Forever**: No subscriptions, no premium tiers, 100% free
- **Open Source**: Available on GitHub at digitalwareshub/tickk

## Target Audience

- ADHD & Neurodivergent individuals seeking friction-free productivity
- Busy professionals needing hands-free task capture
- Students capturing lecture notes and research ideas
- Parents and multitaskers with limited typing time
- People with accessibility needs (mobility challenges, typing difficulties)
- Creative professionals preserving flow states

## Technology Stack

- **Frontend**: Next.js 15, React 18, TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Voice Recognition**: Browser Web Speech API (no AI/cloud processing)
- **NLP**: compromise.js (deterministic, runs locally)
- **Storage**: IndexedDB with localStorage fallback
- **Deployment**: Vercel

## Core Philosophy

1. **Capture First, Organize Later**: Brain dump without categorization friction
2. **Privacy by Design**: No servers, no AI, no data collection
3. **Accessibility First**: Voice-first interface for all abilities
4. **Free Forever**: Productivity shouldn't have a paywall

## Use Cases

### ADHD & Neurodivergent Users
Capture racing thoughts instantly without organizational paralysis. Process later when in "organize mode."

### Professionals
Record meeting insights, action items during commutes, quick braindumps between tasks.

### Students
Lecture notes, research insights, study session captures, assignment idea collection.

### Accessibility
Hands-free productivity for users with mobility challenges or typing difficulties.

## Technical Details

### Voice Processing
- Uses browser's native Web Speech API (Chrome/Edge: Google's engine, Safari: Apple's)
- No audio sent to external servers
- Real-time transcription
- No AI models, no cloud processing

### Classification Algorithm
- compromise.js library for NLP
- Analyzes: action verbs, temporal references, sentence structure
- Deterministic (not machine learning)
- Runs entirely in browser

### Data Storage
- Primary: IndexedDB (structured storage)
- Fallback: localStorage (simple key-value)
- No sync, no cloud backup (user control)
- Export capabilities for backup

## Privacy Guarantees

- No user accounts or authentication
- No cookies (except essential functionality)
- No analytics tracking of content
- No voice recordings stored on servers
- GDPR & CCPA compliant by design
- Open source for verification
